Title: Two Toned Gown with Sheer Panels

Featured-image: 8756-black-gold-two-toned-gown-with-sheer-panels_p.jpg

----

Description: Beautiful A-line gown with two toned skirt. The sides of the skirt are sheer with sparkling sequins dripping down the sides. The bodice is sheer with intricately designed sequins throughout. The sheer back has an oval cutout and the skirt features a high split in the front.
